basics.name: Matthew Moon
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for an Associates in Computer Information Technology at Sullivan University

work.summary: Multiple roles in assembly and shipping.
highlights: Assembly of Camry/Avalon, Forklift, Dock, Shipping

projects.name: Task Manager Application
projects.description: Developed a desktop task management app using Python, PyQt5, and SQLite. Features include user authentication, CRUD operations for tasks, XP-based progression, and dark mode.

projects.name: Crypto Trading Bot
projects.description: Built an automated cryptocurrency trading bot using Python and the Coinbase Advanced API. Implements EMA crossover strategies and real-time market analysis.

projects.name: Robotics Projects
projects.description: Worked on multiple robotics projects using Arduino and Raspberry Pi. Focused on automation, sensor integration, and motor control.
